user.title: Saxo Portfolio Setup
user.description: Set up your Saxo Portfolio integration to monitor your investment portfolio in Home Assistant.

auth.title: Authorize with Saxo Bank
auth.description: Click the link below to authorize Home Assistant to access your Saxo Bank portfolio data.

timezone.title: Configure Market Hours Timezone
timezone.description: Select your primary trading market timezone. This determines when the integration checks for updates more frequently during market hours.

reauth_confirm.title: Reauthenticate {title}
reauth_confirm.description:
The authentication for **{title}** has expired. Please sign in again to continue using the integration.

All your settings, entity history, and automations will be preserved.

reconfigure.title: Reauthenticate {title}
reconfigure.description:
Click **Submit** to sign in again with your Saxo Bank account for **{title}**.

This will refresh your OAuth tokens. All your settings, entity history, and automations will be preserved.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Saxo Bank. Please check your internet connection.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.missing_credentials:
**Application Credentials Required**

Before setting up Saxo Portfolio, you need to configure Application Credentials.

**Steps:**
1. Go to [Saxo Developer Portal]({developer_portal_url}) 
2. Create a production application with redirect URI: `{redirect_uri}`
3. Go to [Application Credentials]({setup_url}) in Home Assistant
4. Add credentials for {domain} with your App Key and Secret
5. Return here to complete setup

**Production OAuth Endpoints:**
• Authorize: {authorize_url}
• Token: {token_url}
abort.reauth_successful: Successfully reauthenticated with Saxo Bank. Your integration will now continue working with the new credentials.

init.title: Saxo Portfolio Options
init.description: Configure how the integration updates portfolio data.

data_description.enable_position_sensors: Create individual sensors for each portfolio position. This adds one sensor per open position showing current price and attributes like market value and profit/loss.

deprecated_yaml.title: YAML configuration is deprecated
deprecated_yaml.description: Configuring Saxo Portfolio using YAML is deprecated. Please remove the YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and set up the integration using the UI.

refresh_data.name: Refresh Portfolio Data
refresh_data.description: Manually refresh portfolio data from Saxo Bank API.
